description: This file defines API routes for managing connector definitions and plugins in a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints to list, retrieve, create, update, and delete connectors, interfacing with a database via SQLAlchemy and a plugin manager. The routes handle both stored connectors and plugin-derived connectors, providing detailed information and performing CRUD operations.

methods.name: list_connectors(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists all available connectors, combining database records and plugin metadata.

methods.name: get_connector(connector_key: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific connector by key, from database or plugin.

methods.name: create_connector( connector_data: dict, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Creates and stores a new connector in the database, returning its details.

methods.name: update_connector( connector_key: str, connector_data: dict, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Updates existing connector information in the database and returns updated details.

methods.name: delete_connector(connector_key: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Deletes a connector record from the database.

ctags.name: delete_connector
ctags.pattern: /^async def delete_connector(connector_key: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: get_connector
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_connector(connector_key: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: update_connector
ctags.signature: ( connector_key: str, connector_data: dict, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
